snippet: An upcoming judicial election brings out the worst in Iowa’s Republican Party.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Iowa Republican Party chairman A J Spiker for mounting a campaign to oust State Supreme Court Justice David Wiggins for ruling with the seven-member court that the state could not deny marriage licenses to same-sex couples; asserts that the fight is not just about a single judge, but about the future of a fair and independent judiciary.
lead_paragraph: An upcoming judicial election brings out the worst in Iowa’s Republican Party.

headline.seo: Politics, Intolerance and Fair Courts in Iowa

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
